com.smaato.soma
Class SomaLibrary

java.lang.Object
  com.smaato.soma.SomaLibrary

public abstract class SomaLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

Allows to access the smaato advertisement server and to display banners.

Copyright Smaato Inc. 2007, 2008

Method Detail

getInstance

public static SomaLibrary getInstance(long publisherId,
                                      long applicationId,
                                      long[] adSpaceIds,
                                      Display display,
                                      SomaActionCallback callback)
                               throws RegistrationException
Retrieves an instance of the SomaLibrary with automatic synchronization.

Parameters:
publisherId - the ID of the publisher/organization
applicationId - the ID of the application, use 0 for testing
adSpaceIds - an array of supported space-IDs, use new long[]{0} for testing, each space ID corresponds to one registered advertisement format
display - the display (required for supporting fullscreen banners)
callback - callback for initiating banner actions
Returns:
an instance of the SOMA Library
Throws:
RegistrationException - when the applcation ID is invalid
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when display or callback is null

getInstance

public static SomaLibrary getInstance(long publisherId,
                                      long applicationId,
                                      long[] adSpaceIds,
                                      Display display,
                                      SomaActionCallback callback,
                                      boolean enableAutomaticSynchronization)
                               throws RegistrationException
Retrieves ant instance of the SomaLibrary.

Parameters:
publisherId - the ID of the publisher/organization
applicationId - the ID of the application, use 0 for testing
adSpaceIds - an array of supported space-IDs, use new long[]{0} for testing, each space ID corresponds to one registered advertisement format
display - the display (required for supporting fullscreen banners)
callback - callback for initiating banner actions
enableAutomaticSynchronization - true when the content should be synchronized automatically
Returns:
an instance of the SOMA Library
Throws:
RegistrationException - when the applcation ID is invalid
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when display or callback is null

getInstance

public static SomaLibrary getInstance()
A convenience method for obtaining the SomaLibrary. Retrieves the instance of the SomaLibrary AFTER you have initialized the SomaLibrary at least once by calling getInstance( long, long, long[], Display, SomaActionCallback ).

Returns:
the soma library
Throws:
RegistrationException - when the SomaLibrary has not been correctly initialized before.
See Also:
getInstance(long, long, long[], Display, SomaActionCallback)

startManualSynchronization

public abstract void startManualSynchronization(long adspaceId)
                                         throws SynchronizationException
Starts to synchronize with the SOMA server manually.

Parameters:
adspaceId - the space ID
Throws:
SynchronizationException - when no synchronization is possible.

getBanner

public abstract BannerItem getBanner(long adSpaceId)
                              throws SynchronizationException
Retrieves the stored banner the given space ID. When no banner is stored, this method will automatically retrieve the next banner from the server

Parameters:
adSpaceId - the space ID
Returns:
a banner that can be embedded in a Canvas
Throws:
SynchronizationException - when no banner could be retrieved

getBannerAsCustomItem

public abstract BannerCustomItem getBannerAsCustomItem(long adSpaceId)
                                                throws SynchronizationException
Retrieves the stored banner the given space ID. When no banner is stored, this method will automatically retrieve the next banner from the server

Parameters:
adSpaceId - the space ID
Returns:
a banner that can be embedded in a Canvas
Throws:
SynchronizationException - when no banner could be retrieved

releaseResources

public abstract void releaseResources()
Releases all resources of the SomaLibrary including references to currently used banners, network connection etc. Call this method if memory is sparse.

exit

public abstract void exit()
Exits the library.

Throws:
SomaException - when exiting fails.

releaseBanner

public void releaseBanner(BannerItem banner)
Releases the specified banner from the memory

Parameters:
banner - the banner

setNumberOfCachedBanners

public void setNumberOfCachedBanners(int number)
Sets the maximum number of banners that are cached in one go.

Parameters:
number - the number of banners

handleBannerAction

public abstract boolean handleBannerAction(BannerItem banner)
Triggers the action associated with the given banner.

Parameters:
banner - the banner
Returns:
true when the action was handled

setServerLiveMode

public abstract void setServerLiveMode(boolean isLive)
Allows to switch between the live and the test server. By default the live server is used when the publisher ID is not 0.

Parameters:
isLive - true when the live server should be used.

setBannerBackgroundColor

public void setBannerBackgroundColor(int color)
Sets the background color for banners in RRGGBB format.

Parameters:
color - the color, default is 0xffffff (white)

setSomaConnector

public void setSomaConnector(SomaConnector connector)
Sets the connector that should be used for network communications. This allows developers to tunnel communications over established sockets, for example. Setting the SomaConnector is only allowed when the live SDK is used, not when the offline SDK is used!

Parameters:
connector - the connector, null if tunneling should be deactivated
